items.title: Hundreds of arrests during deadly Angola fuel protests
items.description: "People are fed up, hunger is rife," activists tell the BBC as thousands join protests in Luanda.

items.title: Russian strikes kill 25 as prison and hospital hit, Ukraine says
items.description: The deadly Russian air strikes come as US President Donald Trump toughens truce ultimatum to Russia.

items.title: Police officer among four dead in shooting at New York City office building
items.description: Authorities say Shane Devon Tamura travelled across the country from Las Vegas to open fire inside the skyscraper.

items.title: BBC visits Beijing region hit by deadly flood
items.description: The BBC's Stephen McDonell is in Miyun, one of the areas hardest-hit by the severe weather.

items.title: Nigeria's victorious women footballers promised $100,000 each
items.description: Returning home as African champions, the president thanked the players for their inspiration.
